imdb.plot outline: Finding, fixing and flipping houses. What does it take to really make money in the renovation game? Is it enough to have experience, a keen eye and great taste? Possibly. But add some serious hustle, cool negotiating skills and nerves of steel and your odds will improve.
imdb.title: The Big Flip
plot: The flip is on in this documentary series. Friends and business partners Randy Mackay and John Stassen work to buy four properties, give them a tune up, and get them sold by the end of the year!

Finding, fixing and flipping houses. What does it take to really make money in the renovation game? Is it enough to have experience, a keen eye and great taste? Possibly. But add some serious hustle, cool negotiating skills and nerves of steel and your odds will improve.
